original_text: This man was taken of the Jews, and should have been killed of them: then came I with an army, and rescued him, having understood that he was a Roman.
korean_text: 이 사람이 유대인들에게 잡혀 죽게 된 것을 내가 로마 사람인 줄 들어 알고 군대를 거느리고 가서 구원하여다가

sentences.original_text: This man was taken of the Jews
and should have been killed of them
then came I with an army
having understood that he was a Roman
